Type Property# rgbXh

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
static let rgbXh: CIFormat
```

## [See Also](/documentation/CoreImage/CIFormat/rgbXh#see-also)

### [Image Formats](/documentation/CoreImage/CIFormat/rgbXh#Image-Formats)

[`static let A16: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/a16)A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.[`static let A8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/a8)An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.[`static let ABGR8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/abgr8)A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the blue, green, and red color components.[`static let ARGB8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/argb8)A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the red, green, and blue color components.[`static let Af: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/af)A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.[`static let Ah: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/ah)A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.[`static let BGRA8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/bgra8)A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the blue, green, and red color components precede the alpha value.[`static let R16: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/r16)A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.[`static let R8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/r8)An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.[`static let RG16: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rg16)A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.[`static let RG8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rg8)A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.[`static let RGB10: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rgb10)[`static let RGBA16: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rgba16)A 64-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format.[`static let RGBX16: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rgbx16)[`static let RGBA8: CIFormat`](/documentation/coreimage/ciformat/rgba8)A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the red, green, and blue color components precede the alpha value.
